description.raw:
This is an example of a physics plugin with two minimal types of a ForwardStep implementation. In both cases, the State consists of just a set of WorldPoses, which is copied to the output.

In the static scene, the Step function doesn't mutate the state; though the state can be updated by the SetStateTo function.

In the falling scene, the Z position of each world pose is decremented with each Step.

title.raw: Minimal examples: static scene and falling scene
